desc: Designs that inspire nostalgia, create emotions, trigger curiosity and expresses individuality. T-shirts that express you, to do you, to be you. Because they're more than just fabric. They're culture, stories, history, and great influences.

layout.text: Because it’s more than just fabric. It's culture, stories, history, great taste, and influences. Designs that inspire nostalgia, create emotions, trigger curiosity, and express individuality-- Paintings that express you, to do you, to be you.
